row.item_desc: Choose which type of background to use for the website. When done, choose the color or upload the image in one of the options below. Note that this background will be below the background slider/image you set up in "Appearance -> Background Slider".
If you wish to have a solid single-color background, choose the color here. This setting will override the texture or image background!
If you wish to use a texture as the website background, please upload the image here. The pattern will automatically be repeated to fill the entire background.
If you wish to have a custom image as a background, please upload it here. The image will be stretched to fit the window size, thus dimensions of at least 1600x1000 pixels are strongly recommended.
Upload your own logo image here.
Upload a custom image to use as the website's favicon (the small icon that appears on the browser tab and in the favourites folder). Recommended formats are ".ico" and ".png".
Enter the text to be placed in the copyright area in the bottom of the footer (below footer widgets). You can use HTML here.

row.item_title: Google Maps for contacts page header
row.item_desc: This map will be shown on the "Contacts Page" template header. Paste the url provided by the Google Maps for your location (found by clicking the little 'chain' button in the top left corner, next to the map).
Input Google Font name for the heading font, e.g. "Open Sans" (without quotes). You can preview Google Fonts here: http://www.google.com/webfonts.
Input Google Font name for the body font, e.g. "Open Sans" (without quotes). You can preview Google Fonts here: http://www.google.com/webfonts.
Select the font size for the body text (all text except for headings). Leave this blank to keep the default size (12px).
Choose the line height (in pixels) for body text. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default value (18px).

Input the text to be shown on the menu label - a coloured strip below the logo that opens the menu in case the "show on mouse over" option has been chosen for the menu. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default text ("Show menu").

Choose the background colour for the menu label - a coloured strip that opens the menu if the "show on mouse over" option has been selected for the menu. Leave this blank to keep the default colour (#B48623).
Choose whether you want the menu items to stretch depending on the text (default) or have a fixed width of 98px.
Choose whether you'd like the menu to drop down when you hover the mouse over the logo (default behaviour), or stay open at all times.
row.item_options: Display the menu on mouse-over,Always display the menu

row.item_desc: Choose the background color of the main menu. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#000000).
Choose the mouse-over colour of the main menu item background. This will also apply to the active menu item. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default colour (#000000).
Choose the text color of the main menu. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the mouse-over color for the main menu text. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFF88).
Choose the font size (in pixels) for menu items. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default value (28px).
Choose the font size (in pixels) for the submenu items. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default size (18px).
Choose the background colour for the body section of the website (content and sidebar). Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#000000);

Choose the background transparency level for the body (content and widgets), where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default transparency level (0.9).
Choose the text color in the body section of the website (content and widgets). Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#AAAAAA).
Choose the colour for the dotted borders separating content elements. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#444444).
Choose the text color main body headings, including page headings and portfolio page headings. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#BB8855).

Choose the thickness of the heading text: 400 is normal thickness, 700 corresponds to the "bold" style. Note: not all Google fonts support all text thickness values. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default value (400).

Choose the text color of post headings and widget headings. This will also apply to the mouse-over text color of sidebar tags and pager. Leave this blank if you wish to use the default color (#999933).

Choose the text color of headings in the comments and post-author sections of the posts. This will also apply to the subheading on the search results page. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#BB8855).
Choose the color of the hyperlinks in the body section of the website (content and widgets). Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the color of the hyperlinks in the body section of the website (content and widgets) on mouse-over. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFCC66).
Choose the border color for input fields in the body section of the website (content and widgets). Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#DDDDDD).
Choose the background color of the input fields in the body section of the website (content and widgets). Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#DDDDDD).
Choose the background color of submit-type buttons in the body section of the website (content and widgets). Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#999999).
Choose the mouse-over background of buttons and the mouse-over color of the input borders. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#666666).
Choose the text color of submit-type buttons. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#000000).
Choose the text color for image captions. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#777777).

row.item_title: Comment and post date text color
row.item_desc: Choose the text color for comment dates and post dates in sidebar widgets. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#777777).
Choose the tag background color. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#999999).
Choose the background color of mouse-over tags. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#666666).
Choose the text color of widget tags. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#000000).
Upload the image to be used as a bullet icon in the "Recent Comments" widget. Recommended dimensions: 20x16 pixels. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default image (grey callout).
Upload the image to be used as a bullet icon in the "Categories" widget. Recommended dimensions: 20x16 pixels. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default image (grey folder).
Upload the image to be used as a bullet icon in the "Archives" widget. Recommended dimensions: 20x16 pixels. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default image (grey calendar).
Upload the image to be used as a bullet icon in the "Pages" widget. Recommended dimensions: 20x16 pixels. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default image (grey sheet).
Upload the image to be used as a bullet icon in the "Twitter" widget. Recommended dimensions: 20x16 pixels. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default image (grey twitter bird).
Choose the background color for shortcode-generated spoilers of style 2. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#E1E1E1).
Choose the background color of shortcode-generated tabs of style 1. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the border color of shortcode-generated tabs of style 1. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#E5E5E5).
Choose the background color for inactive tabs of shortcode-generated tabs of style 1. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#F1F1F1).

row.item_title: Tabs style 1 - tab hover background color
row.item_desc: Choose the mouse-over background color of inactive tabs for shortcode-generated tabs of style 1. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the border color of shortcode-generated tabs of style 2. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the border color of shortcode-generated tabs of style 2. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#E5E5E5).
Choose the background color for inactive tabs of shortcode-generated tabs of style 2. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#F1F1F1).
Choose the mouse-over background color of inactive tabs for shortcode-generated tabs of style 1. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the border color of shortcode-generated tabs of style 3. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the border color of shortcode-generated tabs of style 3. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#E5E5E5).
Choose the mouse-over background color of inactive tabs for shortcode-generated tabs of style 3. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the outer border color for shortcode-generated tables of style 1. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#CCCCCC).

row.item_title: Tables style 1 - inner grid and header row color
row.item_desc: Choose the inner grid color and the header row backgorund color for shortcode-generated tables of style 1. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#E1E1E1).
Choose the background color of odd rows for shortcode-generated tables of style 1. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the background color of even rows for shortcode-generated tables of style 1. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#F1F1F1).

row.item_title: Tables style 1 - header row font color
row.item_desc: Choose the text color of the header row for shortcode-generated tables of style 1. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (same as the global body text color).
Choose the text color of the body rows for shortcode-generated tables of style 1. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (same as the global body text color).

row.item_title: Tables style 2 - outer border and header row color
row.item_desc: Choose the outer border color and the header row backgorund color for shortcode-generated tables of style 2. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#888888).
Choose the background color of odd rows for shortcode-generated tables of style 2. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the background color of even rows for shortcode-generated tables of style 2. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#E2E2E2).

row.item_title: Tables style 2 - header row text color
row.item_desc: Choose the text color of the header row for shortcode-generated tables of style 2. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the text color of the body rows for shortcode-generated tables of style 2. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (same as the body text color).
Upload the texture image for the footer. This will override the solid color fill settings below. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default solid background color (#000000).

Choose the background color for the footer.Note that this setting will work only if the background texture is not chosen above. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default background color (#000000)

Choose the transparency level for the footer background, where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque. Note that this setting does not affect the footer texture, if chosen above. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default level (0.9).
Choose the color of dotted delimiters in footer widgets. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#444444).
Choose the color of the headings in footer widgets. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#C0B74A).
Choose the text color for footer widgets. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#CCCCCC).
Choose the color of links in the footer. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the color of footer links at mouse-over. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFCC66).
Choose the text color for the copyright area (positioned under the footer widget area). Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFFFF).
Choose the text color for copyright links. Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#FFFF88).
Choose the background color for the copyright section (bottom of the footer). Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default color (#000000).
Choose the text color of footer tags (the tag cloud widget). Leave this blank if you wish to keep the default text color (#000000).
Choose the background color for footer tags (the tag cloud widget). Leave this blank if wish to keep the default color (#999999).
Choose the border color of footer tags on mouse-over. Leave blank if you wish to keep the default color (#DDDDDD).
Input your Google Analytics tracking code here, for example "UA-27193434-1" (without quotes).
